moves.1. e4 e5 2. Bc4: What I do in the opening
moves.4. Bb3 a5 5. a3 a4: The queenside is very weak for castling
moves.6. Ba2 Bb7: Queens bishop is bad, VERY bad
moves.8... Qg5: Trying to save queen and let knight take the rook? Queen is still attacked with that move
moves.15... Bd8 16. Qxb8 Bc6 17. Qxd6: Blacks king is sooo exposed, while whites queen bishop and knight are sleeping
moves.20. Nxb5: Knight is starting to be active
moves.21. Qxb5+ Nc6 22. Qxc6+: Black resigned, only move is 22. ...Ke7, and 23. Qe6# is the end. Magics went wrong this game the whole time.
